text: The 1978 GP Ouest-France was the 42nd edition of the GP Ouest-France cycle race and was held on 22 August 1978. The race started and finished in Plouay. The race was won by Pierre-Raymond Villemiane. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 0" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 25" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 25" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 25" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 34" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 34" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 34" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 34" |} |} ==References== 1978 Category:1978 in road cycling Category:1978 in French sport Category:August 1978 sports events in Europe
